title: The House on Cliffside, A Short Story
description: This e-book short story is available on Amazon Kindle through the following author's page: amazon.com/author/cmspencer.The House on Cliffside is an old-fashioned British cozy that takes place in the 1960's in Cornwall, England. It centres around four characters: Colonel Booth, a retired member of Parliament, his children's book author wife, Judith, her secretary, Phyllis Hawthorne, and a handsome young general practitioner, Laurence Scott.Colonel Booth becomes jealous when he thinks Dr. Scott is seeing too much of his wife. When Judith is found dead at the base of the cliff beneath their house, suspicion points to Dr. Scott. A verdict of accidental death is given by the coroner, but Colonel Booth is not convinced.
author: Cathy Spencer
